statements: DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning';
DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_keywords @> ARRAY['AI'];
DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning' AND ARRAY['deep learning', 'natural language processing'] <@ research_keywords
DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_id IN (SELECT research_id FROM research_trends WHERE research_topic ILIKE '%AI%')
DELETE FROM research_topics WHERE topic_name = 'Topic A';
DELETE FROM research_topics WHERE topic_name = 'Machine Learning' AND research_topic_id >= 100
DELETE FROM research_keywords WHERE research_topic_id IN (SELECT research_topic_id FROM research_topics WHERE topic_name LIKE 'Data%')
DELETE FROM research_keywords WHERE keyword_name = 'Machine Learning';
DELETE FROM research_topic_keywords WHERE topic_id = 2 AND keyword_id = 3;
DELETE FROM ResearchTopic WHERE topic_id IN (SELECT topic_id FROM ResearcherResearchTopic WHERE researcher_id = '2eaad27d-3a7a-4a44-b539-ee8b9a56cfe4');

DELETE FROM Keyword WHERE keyword_id IN (SELECT keyword_id FROM ResearchTopicKeyword WHERE topic_id IN (SELECT topic_id FROM ResearcherResearchTopic WHERE researcher_id = '2eaad27d-3a7a-4a44-b539-ee8b9a56cfe4'));
